00017 #ifndef PCAP_VPI_H_
00018 #define PCAP_VPI_H_
00019 #include <stdint.h>
00020 #include <pcap.h>
00021 
00022 typedef struct {
00023   pcap_t *ctx;
00024   pcap_dumper_t *dump;
00025 } pcap_handle_t;
00026 
00027 typedef struct {
00028   int length;
00029   uint8_t *pdata;
00030   uint32_t sec;
00031   uint32_t usec;
00032 } packet_info_t;
00033 
00034 pcap_handle_t pcap_open (char *filename, int bufsize);
00035 void pcap_add_pkt (pcap_dumper_t *dump, packet_info_t *p);
00036 void pcap_shutdown (pcap_handle_t *h);

00038 #endif /*PCAP_VPI_H_*/
